name: Diane 100% Pure Cotton Balls for Face, Makeup Removal, Nail Polish, First-Aid for Everyday Household Use, Cruelty-Free, Hypoallergenic, Free from Chlorine and Fragrance, Vegan -100 Count
short_description: 100% PURE COTTON BALLS: Made from 100% pure cotton, these bulk cotton balls are hypoallergenic, free from chlorine and fragrance, cruelty free and vegan to provide gentle care for all skin types.

SOFT AND ABSORBENT: The soft texture makes these white cotton balls perfect for sensitive skin, ideal for face, baby care, and pet use. Their superior absorbency ensures effective application for beauty routines.

MULTI-PURPOSE USE: A versatile addition to any routine, these small cotton balls are essential for makeup removal, nail polish touch-ups, applying toners, and medical care like ointments and antiseptics.
BULK QUANTITY: With 100 cotton balls per pack, this is the ideal size for busy professionals, salons, spas, or arts and crafts at schools and daycare centers.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Made from biodegradable cotton, these cotton balls come in reusable, recyclable packaging, making them an environmentally conscious choice for everyday use.
product_description: Diane Cotton Swabs aren't just for your ears! The dual sided, 100% soft cotton tips are great for doing your nails, touching up or removing makeup, and many other grooming and personal needs. You can use the tip as an eyeshadow applicator, for eye makeup removal, and to erase eyeliner or mascara smudges. When giving yourself a manicure or pedicure, soak the swab’s cotton tip with nail polish remover, and gently remove excess nail polish from edges of nails and cuticles. Cotton Swabs can even be used on DIY arts and craft projects. Every medicine cabinet should have a cotton swabs, as it’s a versatile, multifunctional beauty tool and accessory. Diane is a multicategory, inclusive beauty brand for women and men of all ages offering affordable everyday essentials. Since 1954, Diane has been an icon in the beauty industry and focused on one thing: understanding the needs our diverse consumer by offering thoughtful, quality beauty products. We hope you love finding new ways to invigorate your beauty routine and that we help make it fun, affordable, and easy.

name: Lil-Lets Cotton Wool Balls, Certified Organic, 100% Pure Cotton Wool, Super Soft, Large Cotton Wool Puffs, Gentle on Skin, Dermatologically Tested, Pack of 100 Balls, White
short_description: CERTIFIED ORGANIC COTTON - Made from 100% pure organic cotton, certified to GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) by the Soil Association. No synthetic pesticides, herbicides, genetically modified organisms (GMOs) or other harsh chemicals are used in the production of Lil-Lets Cotton Wool

GENTLE ON YOUR SKIN - Lil-Lets natural cotton wool balls are dermatologically tested, super soft and gentle, whilst also being strong and absorbent, making them ideal for all your beauty and family needs
LARGE COTTON BALLS - Our large cotton wool balls weigh 1g each, making them ultra absorbent and the perfect size for your everyday, beauty, cleaning, caring and medical needs
ETHICALLY SOURCED - Lil-Lets are committed to ensuring the safe and fair treatment of the people involved in making our cotton products. All our products are also vegan friendly and cruelty free

CHOOSE WHAT WORKS FOR YOU - At Lil-Lets, we understand that everybody is unique. That’s why we design personal care products that cater to your individual needs. With 70 years of experience, you can trust Lil-Lets for a gentle sustainable solution that cares for you and the planet
product_description: Lil-Lets fine cotton wool balls are soft, absorbent and crafted from 100% pure organic cotton. Dermatologically tested and gentle on your skin, they ensure our best care for your personal and beauty routines. Unlike most cotton wool balls, Lil-Let's cotton range is made with certified organic cotton by GOTS and the Soil Association. The Global Organic Textile standard is globally recognised and ensures that all the cotton used in this product meets strict organic standards. Our cotton is grown without the use of synthetic pesticides, herbicides, or genetically modified organisms (GMOs) and prohibits the use of potentially harmful chemicals during the manufacturing process, reflecting a commitment to organic farming practices. We can ensure fair and safe working conditions as well as compliance with environmental criteria that ensures transparency and traceability throughout the full supply chain, giving consumers confidence that by choosing Lil-Lets Cotton, you are being kind to the planet and to people. Each cotton ball weighs 1g, making then bigger than standard cotton wool balls, perfect for your cosmetic, first aid and arts and crafts needs. The 100 cotton balls are packaged conveniently in a drawstring bag, made from 30% recycled plastic, keeping them hygienic and dry, ready for use. Our Lil-Lets Cotton range also includes: cotton buds, cotton rounds, cotton ovals, cotton rolls, cotton pleats and a range of cotton for babies. Choose Lil-Lets cotton for a gentle, sustainable solution that cares for you and the planet. For more information about our products please visit our website
